            </div>

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10720175">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10720175">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10720175">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Using Encompass Search for Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10719880">
          <p>
           Encompass Search finds information by searching through a massive collection of books and scholarly journals, as well as newspapers and magazines, dissertations, conference proceedings, music, video, maps, and more.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10719880" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link13011356">
              <a id="link_13011356" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(13011356,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Books'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 13011356}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To find only books, use the Books limit on the left sidebar of your search results page.  Many items will be in Trexler Library; note the call number and status of the item to check its location and availability.  For items not in Trexler Library, use the Interlibrary Loan button to request a copy from another library.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10720566">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10720566">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10720566">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Using Databases to Find Books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content10720566">
          <p>
           While we typically use databases (like ERIC and PsycINFO) to find journal articles, remember that many databases include citations to (and sometimes full text of) books and book chapters, as well.&nbsp; Check the
           <a href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/content.php?pid=353961&amp;sid=2905888">
            Finding Articles
           </a>
           tab for links to helpful databases!
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt10720566" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
